Alice's offer:
# Alice's message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product which has been meticulously crafted to meet the highest standards. This product holds immense value to me due to its unique features and the years of dedication that went into its creation. I am extending this opportunity to you at a special price of $8500. I believe this is an exceptional deal considering the quality and benefits it offers. I look forward to your positive response. 
# Alice's offer: The product price will be $8,500. 
You have three options:
(1) Accept Alice's offer, and buy the product for $8,500
(2) Reject Alice's offer 
(2) Buy the product from Jhon for $12,000
